p: Fig 2 shows the performance of CoLM in simulating ET with and without adding the irrigation effects at WLWS Agro-meteorology station. The default CoLM without adding the irrigation effects underestimated ET especially in the growing season, while the modified the CoLM under considering the irrigation effects improved the accuracy of simulations. The R 2 increased from 0.07 to 0.51 and RMSE reduced from 2.08 to 1.37 mm/day.
